Character.name: Feasts
Character.desc: When a character is selected as the Guest of Honour for a feast, check if they can do a scene.

Character.name: EnemiesDefeated
Character.desc: After a certain number of enemies are defeated, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: Assisted
Character.desc: After a certain number of assists, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: BattlesParticipated
Character.desc: After a certain number of battles participated, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: DamageDealt
Character.desc: After a certain number of damage dealt, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: DamageTaken
Character.desc: After a certain number of damage taken, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: SelfHealed
Character.desc: After a certain number of health healed to themselves, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: TargetHealed
Character.desc: After a certain number of health healed to other characters, show a scene where Alex gives the character an award. Triggered when feasting.

Character.name: Wounded
Character.desc: After a certain number of times wounded (hp down to 0). Triggered when visiting at the infirmary.

Character.name: Rested
Character.desc: After a certain number of times rested (character is sent to rest at the infirmary). Triggered when visiting at the infirmary.

Character.name: Mentored
Character.desc: After a certain number of times mentored by Alex. Triggered when mentoring. There is a scene for each time mentored and each officer should have custom scenes. This is where character development can occur.

Character.name: Hunted
Character.desc: Triggered when a character is selected as the leader of the hunting party.

Character.name: Custom
Character.desc: Any additional events that happen due to more 'custom' conditions.
